sentences.sContent: Rising unemployment is posing serious problems for the administration.
sentences.sCn: 失业率上升正在给政府造成严重的问题。

synos.tran: 造成，形成；摆姿势；装模作样；提出…讨论

phrases.pCn: 构成威胁；形成一种威胁

words.tran: 位置，方位；职位，工作；姿态；站位；vt. 安置；把……放在适当位置
实证主义；实证论；积极性；武断
难题；装腔作势者；不易处理的事

trans.tranOther: to exist in a way that may cause a problem, danger, difficulty etc
the position in which someone stands or sits, especially in a painting, photograph etc
